message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity that I think you won't want to pass up. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but that price is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $700,000?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I can do $820,000, but that's as low as I can go.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  $820,000 is closer, but I need to be around $750,000 for this to work for me.
I can see you're really interested in this product, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. I can meet you halfway at $785,000, but that's as close as I can get.
